root.name: 1213: Episode 1
root.description: 1213 Episode 1 introduces you to a man with amnesia, lying in a cell, who does not remember his name, being referred to only as 1213. Every day 1213 is taken out of his cell and forced to run an extremely dangerous hazard course, apparently for the sole amusement of the man who seems to be running the facility. One day, 1213 is sitting in his cell when the cell door falls open. He must adventure into the unknown world beyond the cell to discover the answers to all of the mysteries that plague his thoughts.
